section.heading: Tolling of tenant deadlines during a public health emergency.
section.text: The running of all time periods for tenants and tenant organizations to exercise rights under this act shall be tolled from the beginning of the period of a public health emergency declared pursuant to section 5a of the District of Columbia Public Emergency Act of 1980, effective October 17, 2002 (D.C. Law 14-194; D.C. Official Code ยง 7-2304.01), until the end of the public health emergency, and for 30 days thereafter.
